page.title: 01An Area Overview.
page.content: In our block we have the{main part {of Weymouth.}We have the{town centre which includes the{main shops.}We have some new shops opening in September. The{main industry is tourism}as we have a{nice beach.}We have a{theatre {and hotels.}We have a{fishing pier}and {Sealink boats}which can take you from {Weymouth to France,Guernsey or Jersey. We have{Weymouth harbour}and one {lifeboat. In{Southill}we have a{Nature Reserve called{Radipole Lake.}It has a hide where you can see the birds,but they can't see you.If you walk a bit further you will see the{Bus Station, {Train Station}and the{Jubilee Clock. The Jubilee Clock is{Victorian.}We also have the{Nothe Fort. Many{holiday makers}come to{Weymouth in the{Summer. Georgina Hutton.
